text: Rubén Mendoza Ayala (2 February 1961 – 16 April 2016) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Party of the Democratic Revolution. He served as Deputy of the LVII and LIX Legislatures of the Mexican Congress. He served from 2014 until his death in 2016. He represented the State of Mexico. Ayala was born in Tlalnepantla, Mexico. He studied at National Autonomous University of Mexico. Ayala died of cardiac arrest on 16 April 2016 in Ciudad del Carmen, aged 55. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Mexican politicians Category:People from Tlalnepantla de Baz Category:Mayors from Mexico (state)
title: Rubén Mendoza Ayala
